name: Gem Trek Waterton Lakes National Park 4th Edition
description: Explore all the hiking and biking trails within Waterton Lakes National Park, the eastern end of Akamina-Kishinena Provincial Park and the northern area of Glacier National Park, Montana. Includes descriptions of over 20 day hikes, bike trails multi-day trips with distance, elevation gain and colour photographs. Don't forget to visit the Waterton townsite. Use the inset map (1:35,000) to help you find accomodations and services.
